task: Parse an AWS S3 bucket name from an S3 URI in the format 's3://bucket-name/key/path'
Create a JSON configuration object for an AWS Lambda function that specifies the runtime as 'python3.11', timeout as 60 seconds, and memory as 512 MB
Write a Python function that takes an AWS EC2 instance ID string and returns True if it matches the valid format (e.g., 'i-1234567890abcdef0')
